channel.title: Homes on MeelGroup
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on MeelGroup

item.description: Meel Group Welcome to the Meel Group’s web page. We are situated at National University of Singapore.

item.title: News
item.description: 20 June 2018 I will be at IJCAI from July 12 – July 19 and at Leiden University on July 20. I will be co-presenting tutorial with Supratik Chakraborty at IJCAI on July 13. # -- 30 November 2018 The next version of ApproxMC is here: ApproxMC3 is faster and better than ever before. Do read Mate’s post for quick synopsys of the magic sauce behind ApproxMC’s performance. 30 November 2018 Congratulations Alexis for a successful defense of Masters thesis 04 Novemeber 2018 Kuldeep was awarded Distinguished Program Committee Member for IJCAI 2018.

item.title: People
Contact
item.description: Kuldeep S. Meel<br /> Assistant Professor<br /> Computer Science Department, School of Computing<br /> National University of Singapore<br /> Please consult <a href="https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?src=meel%40comp.nus.edu.sg"> Kuldeep's calendar </a> before suggesting a meeting time.

item.title: Openings
item.description: Looking for candidates with strong background in CS/Mathematics/Physics for post-doc for the project: Beyond NP Revolution. Read advertisement for more details. Two post-doc positions available in the broad area of applying machine learning to SAT solvers, approximate counting techniques, and CP. Read advertisement for more details. We are always looking for highly motivated Ph.D. students, research assistants with time commitment of at least 6 months and summer internship for exceptional undergraduate interns in our group.
